name: Derek Pacion

topics.topic_text: Can I get some directions around town?
topics.response_text: Uncle Roe and I live in the old town hall, and Mr. Porter runs the diner across the street. It's not really a big place, you know?

topics.topic_text: Don't sell yourself short. Even the little jobs can be important.
topics.response_text: Sounds like you've never spent a day mucking out Brahmin pens with a busted shovel.

topics.topic_text: Calm down, kid. Can you actually say a whole sentence at once?
topics.response_text: Sorry. I mean, I'm Derek. Welcome to Canterbury, Miss. Commons. Canterbury Commons. Miss.{Very embarrassed and flustered}

topics.topic_text: I already talked to your uncle. I figured I'd talk to you, too.
topics.response_text: Huh. Why'd you want to do that?

topics.topic_text: Sometimes people can have hidden depths even they don't know about.
topics.response_text: I guess, sure. I'll keep an eye out for any hidden depths, okay?

topics.topic_text: Now that I think about it, I'm not really sure.
topics.response_text: Well, if you figure it out, be sure to let me know, okay? I'm kind of busy.

topics.topic_text: Because I wanted to talk to the world's biggest pain in the ass, apparently.
topics.response_text: Well, hope you had fun with that.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Canterbury Commons?
topics.response_text: It's okay, I guess. I heard it's safer than most places, because the raiders don't bother us. But I've never been anywhere else, so I don't know.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Can't talk now. They're fighting! This is awesome!{(quickly) with extreme excited}

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about the AntAgonizer?
topics.response_text: I don't know much about her, except she really, really doesn't like people. That's kinda cool. I mean, sometimes people are jerks.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about the Mechanist?
topics.response_text: I knew the Mechanist back when he was just a normal-hero. He used to be called Scott, and he fixed up stuff around town!

topics.topic_text: Know anything else that could help me stop them?
topics.response_text: No way! Don't stop them! They're awesome!

topics.topic: MS02AboutSupersDo you know anything about the AntAgonizer or the Mechanist?
topics.topic_text: What do you know about the AntAgonizer and the Mechanist?
topics.response_text: You mean the super-heroes? Yeah, I try to watch all of their fights!

topics.topic_text: That's enough about them.
topics.response_text: Well, okay.

topics.topic_text: What are their super powers? Do they have any weaknesses?
topics.response_text: That's easy! The AntAgonizer's suit makes her super-agile, but I guess her ants are pretty weak on their own. Just watch out for her royal guard.

topics.topic_text: Never mind.
topics.response_text: That's right! Go away!

topics.topic_text: Yeah, I saw it. What can you tell me about them?
topics.response_text: The AntAgonizer, she's this evil supervillain who's trying to wipe out humans with her ants. And the Mechanist protects us with his robots!{overly excited}

topics.topic_text: This is serious business. You could get hurt. What do you know about them?
topics.response_text: You sound like Uncle Roe. He never lets me watch when they fight.{emotionally crushed, was excited, but is now not really interested in talking about it}

topics.topic_text: Are those jokers for real? What's up with the silly costumes?
topics.response_text: No way, they're awesome! And their suits are really cool, too!{excited}

topics.topic_text: Life around here is pretty hard, huh?
topics.response_text: Yeah, I guess. There's no one to play with. Everyone is so serious. It really kinda sucks.{awkward}

topics.topic_text: Those guys must really liven the place up, huh? Anyone ever get hurt?
topics.response_text: You think they're neat too, huh? It's not like they ever hurt anyone. Well not, like, really badly hurt, or anything.{emphasizing "not, like, really BADLY hurt..."}

topics.topic_text: You're insane, kid.
topics.response_text: Oh yeah? Well... well...{Trying to come up with a comeback.}

topics.topic_text: He promised me money for a job. Pay up, or else.
topics.response_text: First you took away my uncle, and now you took away them, too? Fine - here! Take it and go away forever!

topics.topic_text: SpeechChallengeFailure
topics.response_text: Umm. I just remembered something I need to do. Bye.{getting weird vibes and running away}

conversation.response_text: No, no, never mind. Pretend I didn't say anything.{Embarrassed and ending the conversation}
Say hi to the Mechanist for me!
Aw, you made this place get so boring.{bored frustration}

description:
Derek Pacion is a 15 year-old Caucasian Male.

A 15-year-old human boy who has lived in Canterbury Commons his entire life. Derek works as a general assistant in the town, having lost both parents to separate raider attacks when he was younger. He is introverted and reserved, speaking only when necessary. Derek spends his free time reading pre-War Hubris Comics and creating drawings of the local hero, the Mechanist, who protects the town from the AntAgonizer's ant armies.

Derek Pacion's Personality: Introverted, reserved, observant, and quiet. Derek has a fascination with superheroes and hero worship, particularly admiring the Mechanist. Despite his reserved nature, he cares deeply for his friends and the community of Canterbury Commons.

Derek Pacion's Backstory: Derek was born and raised in Canterbury Commons to Louis Pacion and Daisy Roe, traders who met and settled in the town. When Derek was 9, his mother Daisy was killed in a raider attack. Three years later, when he was 12, his father Louis also fell victim to a separate raider attack. Left orphaned, Derek was taken in by his uncle Ernest Roe, who serves as the mayor of Canterbury Commons. Derek has maintained a friendship with Ralph, the son of Dave from the Republic of Dave, and often travels there to visit. He also knew Scott Wollinski before Scott became the Mechanist, and was the one who convinced Scott to adopt the superhero persona to fight the AntAgonizer after she destroyed one of his robots.
